title: The Gospel of the Rauschmonstrum
description: A retelling of the Gospels where Jesus is tricked into thinking he is the son of God by a shape-shifting monster known as the Rauschmonstrum. It is a tale about love, cruelty, misunderstanding, agonizing despair, walking on water, healing the sick, and one unusual case of a person being impersonated after their death.
author: Nick LaTorre
